parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.52

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns array of [[Boolean]]s corresponding to the visibility of various HUD elements (see extended [[showHUD]]).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''shownHUD'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] in format [hud, info, radar, compass, direction, menu, group, cursors, panels, kills, icon3d]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_hudStatus = [[shownHUD]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[showHUD]], [[shownMap]], [[visibleMap]], [[forceMap]], [[shownGPS]], [[shownWatch]], [[shownCompass]], [[shownUAVFeed]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
